name: users
description: User Microservice for the Adventure Capitalist Game

scripts.server: cross-env DEBUG=adventure-capitalist-users:* PORT=5050 nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.user-create: cross-env DEBUG=adventure-capitalist-users:* PORT=5050 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/users-create.js
scripts.user-read: cross-env DEBUG=adventure-capitalist-users:* PORT=5050 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/users-read.js dev.stevendaye@yahoo.com
scripts.user-delete: cross-env DEBUG=adventure-capitalist-users:* PORT=5050 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/users-delete.js dev.stevendaye@yahoo.com
scripts.user-list: cross-env DEBUG=adventure-capitalist-users:* PORT=5050 nodemon --exec babel-node scripts/users-list.js
